title: saadaka kalpalathE
sahitya:
sAdhaka kalpalatE sangIta dEvatE satatamava lalitE sakala kalAvasatE

anupallavi

 sAdhu guNa vinutE sajjanAvana vrtE sAmagAnamuditE varadE vAgdEvatE

caraNam

 indumukhi surEndra vandyapAdE bhArati tindu kAraNyEshvari bhAmati krpAvati 
sundara kalAtati vitata vilasavati kundavana tulasI bhUSitE sarasvati
